<Link id="l01101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1101"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1102"><span class="doxyHighlight">      CurrentBB = BI-&gt;getSuccessor(0);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1103"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1104"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1105"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1106"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;BI = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a22eeee01734061ac1b31ccd994c49eef">dyn&#95;cast&lt;BranchInst&gt;</a>(CurrentTerm);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1107"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!BI)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1108"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We do not understand other terminator instructions.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1109"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/groups/arcopt/#gaa57b1a4e6a1c79233913139635169cf1">Changed</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1110"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1111"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Don&#39;t bother trying to unswitch past an unconditional branch or a branch</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1112"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// with a constant value. These should be removed by simplifycfg prior to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1113"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// running this pass.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1114"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!BI-&gt;isConditional() ||</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1115"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a92ca992e52dddc420f4b069cae06dfbe">isa&lt;Constant&gt;</a>(<a href="#a5ca2e820d1b5a49dcaad5e6873917198">skipTrivialSelect</a>(BI-&gt;getCondition())))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1116"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/groups/arcopt/#gaa57b1a4e6a1c79233913139635169cf1">Changed</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1117"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1118"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Found a trivial condition candidate: non-foldable conditional branch. If</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1119"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// we fail to unswitch this, we can&#39;t do anything else that is trivial.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1120"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!<a href="#a6a082aa2e05f44f7dab89e2ff8c582ff">unswitchTrivialBranch</a>(L, &#42;BI, DT, LI, SE, MSSAU))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1121"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/groups/arcopt/#gaa57b1a4e6a1c79233913139635169cf1">Changed</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1122"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1123"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Mark that we managed to unswitch something.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1124"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/groups/arcopt/#gaa57b1a4e6a1c79233913139635169cf1">Changed</a> = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01125" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1125"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1126"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If we only unswitched some of the conditions feeding the branch, we won&#39;t</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1127"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// have collapsed it to a single successor.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01128" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1128"><span class="doxyHighlight">    BI = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac4fc845f5ed92de63cd4474f128f5fc5">cast&lt;BranchInst&gt;</a>(CurrentBB-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock/#aef9e9fcf4c5dfce90276ca16d91b8e46">getTerminator</a>());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01129" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1129"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (BI-&gt;isConditional())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1130"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/groups/arcopt/#gaa57b1a4e6a1c79233913139635169cf1">Changed</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1131"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1132"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Follow the newly unconditional branch into its successor.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01133" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1133"><span class="doxyHighlight">    CurrentBB = BI-&gt;getSuccessor(0);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01134" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1134"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01135" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1135"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// When continuing, if we exit the loop or reach a previous visited block,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01136" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1136"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// then we can not reach any trivial condition candidates (unfoldable</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01137" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1137"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// branch instructions or switch instructions) and no unswitch can happen.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01138" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1138"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">while</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (L.contains(CurrentBB) &amp;&amp; Visited.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallptrsetimpl/#a9d834ae3da8c62c2b668dada51335eb0">insert</a>(CurrentBB).second);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1139"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01140" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1140"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/groups/arcopt/#gaa57b1a4e6a1c79233913139635169cf1">Changed</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01141" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1141"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1142"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01143" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1143"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Build the cloned blocks for an unswitched copy of the given loop.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01144" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1144"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1145"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// The cloned blocks are inserted before the loop preheader (&#96;LoopPH&#96;) and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1146"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// after the split block (&#96;SplitBB&#96;) that will be used to select between the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1147"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// cloned and original loop.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1148"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01149" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1149"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// This routine handles cloning all of the necessary loop blocks and exit</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1150"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// blocks including rewriting their instructions and the relevant PHI nodes.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01151" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1151"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Any loop blocks or exit blocks which are dominated by a different successor</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01152" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1152"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// than the one for this clone of the loop blocks can be trivially skipped. We</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01153" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1153"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// use the &#96;DominatingSucc&#96; map to determine whether a block satisfies that</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01154" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1154"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// property with a simple map lookup.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1155"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1156"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// It also correctly creates the unconditional branch in the cloned</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1157"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// unswitched parent block to only point at the unswitched successor.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01158" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1158"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01159" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1159"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// This does not handle most of the necessary updates to &#96;LoopInfo&#96;. Only exit</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01160" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1160"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// block splitting is correctly reflected in &#96;LoopInfo&#96;, essentially all of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01161" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1161"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// the cloned blocks (and their loops) are left without full &#96;LoopInfo&#96;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1162"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// updates. This also doesn&#39;t fully update &#96;DominatorTree&#96;. It adds the cloned</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01163" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1163"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// blocks to them but doesn&#39;t create the cloned &#96;DominatorTree&#96; structure and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01164" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1164"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// instead the caller must recompute an accurate DT. It &#42;does&#42; correctly</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01165" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1165"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// update the &#96;AssumptionCache&#96; provided in &#96;AC&#96;.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01166" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1166" lineLink="#aea49493e2ae224d30cda2b3235d180b0"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;<a href="#aea49493e2ae224d30cda2b3235d180b0">buildClonedLoopBlocks</a>(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01167" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1167"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loop">Loop</a> &amp;L, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;LoopPH, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;SplitBB,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01168" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1168"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef&lt;BasicBlock &#42;&gt;</a> ExitBlocks, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;ParentBB,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01169" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1169"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;UnswitchedSuccBB, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;ContinueSuccBB,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1170"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smalldensemap">SmallDenseMap&lt;BasicBlock &#42;, BasicBlock &#42;, 16&gt;</a> &amp;DominatingSucc,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1171"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#abf0f52ae29f87b5e0f2b95ff961cdae1">ValueToValueMapTy</a> &amp;VMap,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01172" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1172"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl">SmallVectorImpl&lt;DominatorTree::UpdateType&gt;</a> &amp;DTUpdates, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/assumptioncache">AssumptionCache</a> &amp;AC,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01173" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1173"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dominatortree">DominatorTree</a> &amp;DT, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loopinfo">LoopInfo</a> &amp;LI, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/memoryssaupdater">MemorySSAUpdater</a> &#42;MSSAU,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01174" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1174"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scalarevolution">ScalarEvolution</a> &#42;SE) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01175" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1175"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">SmallVector&lt;BasicBlock &#42;, 4&gt;</a> NewBlocks;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01176" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1176"><span class="doxyHighlight">  NewBlocks.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl/#a499ea32ca1b8d16cedfe01d1e5b08f29">reserve</a>(L.getNumBlocks() + ExitBlocks.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref/#a85ffb6531d4cda988ea81f18d4e56fb7">size</a>());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01177" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1177"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01178" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1178"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We will need to clone a bunch of blocks, wrap up the clone operation in</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01179" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1179"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// a helper.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01180" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1180"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> CloneBlock = &#91;&amp;&#93;(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;OldBB) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01181" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1181"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Clone the basic block and insert it before the new preheader.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01182" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1182"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;NewBB = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aa1c8d384f90fc9d69d7fcdf920138cf2">CloneBasicBlock</a>(OldBB, VMap, </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;.us&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">, OldBB-&gt;getParent());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01183" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1183"><span class="doxyHighlight">    NewBB-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock/#ac1fd6437bbfce263b87f01767d950ce5">moveBefore</a>(LoopPH);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01184" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1184"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01185" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1185"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Record this block and the mapping.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01186" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1186"><span class="doxyHighlight">    NewBlocks.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatebase/#af42bfbc067df27c19ee2fc859df58799">push&#95;back</a>(NewBB);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01187" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1187"><span class="doxyHighlight">    VMap&#91;OldBB&#93; = NewBB;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01188" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1188"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01189" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1189"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NewBB;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01190" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1190"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01191" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1191"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01192" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1192"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We skip cloning blocks when they have a dominating succ that is not the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01193" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1193"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// succ we are cloning for.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01194" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1194"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> SkipBlock = &#91;&amp;&#93;(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;BB) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01195" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1195"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> It = DominatingSucc.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/densemapbase/#a0c047f127ed4380a6f383d70bec4eb94">find</a>(BB);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01196" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1196"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> It != DominatingSucc.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/densemapbase/#a65520b9c67759099e313d0f4e7b5ff9e">end</a>() &amp;&amp; It-&gt;second != UnswitchedSuccBB;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01197" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1197"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01198" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1198"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01199" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1199"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// First, clone the preheader.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01200" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1200"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;ClonedPH = CloneBlock(LoopPH);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01201" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1201"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01202" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1202"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Then clone all the loop blocks, skipping the ones that aren&#39;t necessary.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01203" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1203"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;LoopBB : L.blocks())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01204" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1204"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!SkipBlock(LoopBB))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01205" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1205"><span class="doxyHighlight">      CloneBlock(LoopBB);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01206" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1206"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01207" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1207"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Split all the loop exit edges so that when we clone the exit blocks, if</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01208" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1208"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// any of the exit blocks are &#42;also&#42; a preheader for some other loop, we</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01209" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1209"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// don&#39;t create multiple predecessors entering the loop header.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01210" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1210"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;ExitBB : ExitBlocks) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01211" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1211"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (SkipBlock(ExitBB))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01212" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1212"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01213" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1213"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01214" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1214"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// When we are going to clone an exit, we don&#39;t need to clone all the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01215" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1215"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// instructions in the exit block and we want to ensure we have an easy</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01216" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1216"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// place to merge the CFG, so split the exit first. This is always safe to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01217" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1217"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// do because there cannot be any non-loop predecessors of a loop exit in</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01218" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1218"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// loop simplified form.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01219" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1219"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;MergeBB = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac6c9ffe7979754415f4ca0d677174bc2">SplitBlock</a>(ExitBB, ExitBB-&gt;begin(), &amp;DT, &amp;LI, MSSAU);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01220" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1220"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01221" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1221"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Rearrange the names to make it easier to write test cases by having the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01222" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1222"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// exit block carry the suffix rather than the merge block carrying the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01223" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1223"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// suffix.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01224" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1224"><span class="doxyHighlight">    MergeBB-&gt;takeName(ExitBB);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01225" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1225"><span class="doxyHighlight">    ExitBB-&gt;setName(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/twine">Twine</a>(MergeBB-&gt;getName()) + </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;.split&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01226" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1226"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01227" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1227"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Now clone the original exit block.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01228" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1228"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;ClonedExitBB = CloneBlock(ExitBB);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01233" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1233"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01234" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1234"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Remap any cloned instructions and create a merge phi node for them.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01235" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1235"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ZippedInsts : <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a740d35e0d3e2f7601f845b641fe58971">llvm::zip&#95;first</a>(</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01265" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1265"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01266" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1266"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01267" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1267"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Rewrite the instructions in the cloned blocks to refer to the instructions</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01281" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1281"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01282" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1282"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01283" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1283"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Update any PHI nodes in the cloned successors of the skipped blocks to not</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01408" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1408"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01409" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1409"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Build the cloned loops of an original loop from unswitching.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01410" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1410"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01411" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1411"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Because unswitching simplifies the CFG of the loop, this isn&#39;t a trivial</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01412" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1412"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// operation. We need to re-verify that there even is a loop (as the backedge</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01413" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1413"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// may not have been cloned), and even if there are remaining backedges the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01414" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1414"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// backedge set may be different. However, we know that each child loop is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01415" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1415"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// undisturbed, we only need to find where to place each child loop within</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01416" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1416"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// either any parent loop or within a cloned version of the original loop.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01417" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1417"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01418" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1418"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Because child loops may end up cloned outside of any cloned version of the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01419" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1419"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// original loop, multiple cloned sibling loops may be created. All of them</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01420" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1420"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// are returned so that the newly introduced loop nest roots can be</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01421" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1421"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// identified.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01422" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1422" lineLink="#afe5225e90ea8896cab9cda7246af413d"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="#afe5225e90ea8896cab9cda7246af413d">buildClonedLoops</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loop">Loop</a> &amp;OrigL, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef&lt;BasicBlock &#42;&gt;</a> ExitBlocks,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01423" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1423"><span class="doxyHighlight">                             </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#abf0f52ae29f87b5e0f2b95ff961cdae1">ValueToValueMapTy</a> &amp;VMap, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loopinfo">LoopInfo</a> &amp;LI,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01424" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1424"><span class="doxyHighlight">                             <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl">SmallVectorImpl&lt;Loop &#42;&gt;</a> &amp;NonChildClonedLoops) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01761" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1761"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01767" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1767"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Check that the dominator tree has already been updated.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01770" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1770"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Drop all uses of the instructions to make sure we won&#39;t have dangling</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01771" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1771"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// uses in other blocks.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01781" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1781"><span class="doxyHighlight">    BB-&gt;eraseFromParent();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01782" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1782"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01783" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1783"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01784" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1784"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Recompute the set of blocks in a loop after unswitching.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01785" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1785"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01786" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1786"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// This walks from the original headers predecessors to rebuild the loop. We</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01787" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1787"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// take advantage of the fact that new blocks can&#39;t have been added, and so we</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01788" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1788"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// filter by the original loop&#39;s blocks. This also handles potentially</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01789" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1789"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// unreachable code that we don&#39;t want to explore but might be found examining</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01790" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1790"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// the predecessors of the header.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01791" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1791"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01792" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1792"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// If the original loop is no longer a loop, this will return an empty set. If</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01793" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1793"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// it remains a loop, all the blocks within it will be added to the set</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01794" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1794"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// (including those blocks in inner loops).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01795" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1795" lineLink="#a0c9b0aa6fff67d00a95f47fc121491e5"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallptrset">SmallPtrSet&lt;const BasicBlock &#42;, 16&gt;</a> <a href="#a0c9b0aa6fff67d00a95f47fc121491e5">recomputeLoopBlockSet</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loop">Loop</a> &amp;L,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01796" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1796"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                                                 <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loopinfo">LoopInfo</a> &amp;LI) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01797" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1797"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallptrset">SmallPtrSet&lt;const BasicBlock &#42;, 16&gt;</a> LoopBlockSet;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01798" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1798"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01799" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1799"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;PH = L.getLoopPreheader();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01800" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1800"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;Header = L.getHeader();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01801" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1801"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01802" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1802"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// A worklist to use while walking backwards from the header.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01803" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1803"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">SmallVector&lt;BasicBlock &#42;, 16&gt;</a> Worklist;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01804" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1804"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01805" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1805"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// First walk the predecessors of the header to find the backedges. This will</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01806" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1806"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// form the basis of our walk.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01807" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1807"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;Pred : <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#acb22fb04083152eee862457e42e8dc31">predecessors</a>(Header)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01808" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1808"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Skip the preheader.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01809" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1809"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Pred == PH)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01810" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1810"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01811" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1811"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01812" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1812"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Because the loop was in simplified form, the only non-loop predecessor</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01813" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1813"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// is the preheader.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01814" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1814"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(L.contains(Pred) &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Found a predecessor of the loop header other &quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01815" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1815"><span class="doxyHighlight">                               </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;than the preheader that is not part of the &quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01816" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1816"><span class="doxyHighlight">                               </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;loop!&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01817" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1817"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01818" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1818"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Insert this block into the loop set and on the first visit and, if it</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01819" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1819"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// isn&#39;t the header we&#39;re currently walking, put it into the worklist to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01820" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1820"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// recurse through.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01821" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1821"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (LoopBlockSet.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallptrsetimpl/#a9d834ae3da8c62c2b668dada51335eb0">insert</a>(Pred).second &amp;&amp; Pred != Header)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01822" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1822"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Worklist.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatebase/#af42bfbc067df27c19ee2fc859df58799">push&#95;back</a>(Pred);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01823" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1823"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01824" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1824"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01825" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1825"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If no backedges were found, we&#39;re done.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01826" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1826"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (LoopBlockSet.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallptrsetimplbase/#af8a50544090e81ac83601aff8f4b0142">empty</a>())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01827" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1827"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> LoopBlockSet;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01828" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1828"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01829" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1829"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We found backedges, recurse through them to identify the loop blocks.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01830" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1830"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">while</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!Worklist.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatecommon/#ad9a3c7bc26b130377bbafc170b5f88a2">empty</a>()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01831" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1831"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;BB = Worklist.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl/#a0c8ffe664a36e30d49c84d0aded2fe08">pop&#95;back&#95;val</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01832" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1832"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(LoopBlockSet.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallptrsetimpl/#a1f475b0df44ebd7169e720fa1bf9169e">count</a>(BB) &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Didn&#39;t put block into the loop set!&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01833" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1833"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01834" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1834"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// No need to walk past the header.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01835" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1835"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (BB == Header)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01836" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1836"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01837" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1837"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01838" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1838"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Because we know the inner loop structure remains valid we can use the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01839" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1839"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// loop structure to jump immediately across the entire nested loop.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01840" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1840"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Further, because it is in loop simplified form, we can directly jump</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01841" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1841"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// to its preheader afterward.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01842" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1842"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loop">Loop</a> &#42;InnerL = LI.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loopinfobase/#ad61bd84d4988c90bf6c5cd62d8e7fb00">getLoopFor</a>(BB))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01843" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1843"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (InnerL != &amp;L) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01844" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1844"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(L.contains(InnerL) &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01845" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1845"><span class="doxyHighlight">               </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Should not reach a loop &#42;outside&#42; this loop!&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01846" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1846"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The preheader is the only possible predecessor of the loop so</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01847" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1847"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// insert it into the set and check whether it was already handled.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01848" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1848"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;InnerPH = InnerL-&gt;getLoopPreheader();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01849" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1849"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(L.contains(InnerPH) &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Cannot contain an inner loop block &quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01850" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1850"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                      </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;but not contain the inner loop &quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01851" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1851"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                      </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;preheader!&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01852" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1852"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!LoopBlockSet.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallptrsetimpl/#a9d834ae3da8c62c2b668dada51335eb0">insert</a>(InnerPH).second)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01853" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1853"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The only way to reach the preheader is through the loop body</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01854" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1854"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// itself so if it has been visited the loop is already handled.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01855" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1855"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01856" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1856"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01857" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1857"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Insert all of the blocks (other than those already present) into</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01858" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1858"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the loop set. We expect at least the block that led us to find the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01859" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1859"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// inner loop to be in the block set, but we may also have other loop</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01860" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1860"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// blocks if they were already enqueued as predecessors of some other</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01861" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1861"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// outer loop block.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01862" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1862"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;InnerBB : InnerL-&gt;blocks()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01863" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1863"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (InnerBB == BB) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01864" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1864"><span class="doxyHighlight">            <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(LoopBlockSet.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallptrsetimpl/#a1f475b0df44ebd7169e720fa1bf9169e">count</a>(InnerBB) &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01865" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1865"><span class="doxyHighlight">                   </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Block should already be in the set!&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01866" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1866"><span class="doxyHighlight">            </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01867" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1867"><span class="doxyHighlight">          &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01868" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1868"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01869" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1869"><span class="doxyHighlight">          LoopBlockSet.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallptrsetimpl/#a9d834ae3da8c62c2b668dada51335eb0">insert</a>(InnerBB);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01870" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1870"><span class="doxyHighlight">        &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01871" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1871"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01872" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1872"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Add the preheader to the worklist so we will continue past the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01873" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1873"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// loop body.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01874" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1874"><span class="doxyHighlight">        Worklist.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatebase/#af42bfbc067df27c19ee2fc859df58799">push&#95;back</a>(InnerPH);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01875" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1875"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01876" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1876"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01877" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1877"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01878" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1878"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Insert any predecessors that were in the original loop into the new</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01879" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1879"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// set, and if the insert is successful, add them to the worklist.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01880" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1880"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;Pred : <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#acb22fb04083152eee862457e42e8dc31">predecessors</a>(BB))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01881" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1881"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (L.contains(Pred) &amp;&amp; LoopBlockSet.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallptrsetimpl/#a9d834ae3da8c62c2b668dada51335eb0">insert</a>(Pred).second)</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01883" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1883"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01884" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1884"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01885" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1885"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(LoopBlockSet.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallptrsetimpl/#a1f475b0df44ebd7169e720fa1bf9169e">count</a>(Header) &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Cannot fail to add the header!&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01887" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1887"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We&#39;ve found all the blocks participating in the loop, return our completed</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01891" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1891"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01892" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1892"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Rebuild a loop after unswitching removes some subset of blocks and edges.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01893" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1893"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01894" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1894"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// The removal may have removed some child loops entirely but cannot have</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01895" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1895"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// disturbed any remaining child loops. However, they may need to be hoisted</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01896" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1896"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// to the parent loop (or to be top-level loops). The original loop may be</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01897" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1897"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// completely removed.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01898" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1898"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01899" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1899"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// The sibling loops resulting from this update are returned. If the original</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01900" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1900"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// loop remains a valid loop, it will be the first entry in this list with all</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01901" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1901"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// of the newly sibling loops following it.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01902" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1902"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01903" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1903"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Returns true if the loop remains a loop after unswitching, and false if it</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01904" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1904"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// is no longer a loop after unswitching (and should not continue to be</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01905" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1905"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// referenced).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01906" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1906" lineLink="#ab79f3dcf9607c6a8908cda57cc964f49"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="#ab79f3dcf9607c6a8908cda57cc964f49">rebuildLoopAfterUnswitch</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loop">Loop</a> &amp;L, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef&lt;BasicBlock &#42;&gt;</a> ExitBlocks,</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01909" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1909"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                     <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scalarevolution">ScalarEvolution</a> &#42;SE) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01911" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1911"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01912" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1912"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Compute the actual parent loop from the exit blocks. Because we may have</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01913" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1913"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// pruned some exits the loop may be different from the original parent.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01926" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1926"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Recompute the blocks participating in this loop. This may be empty if it</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01927" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1927"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// is no longer a loop.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01929" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1929"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01930" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1930"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If we still have a loop, we need to re-set the loop&#39;s parent as the exit</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01931" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1931"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// block set changing may have moved it within the loop nest. Note that this</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01932" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1932"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// can only happen when this loop has a parent as it can only hoist the loop</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01933" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1933"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &#42;up&#42; the nest.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01934" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1934"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!LoopBlockSet.empty() &amp;&amp; L.getParentLoop() != ParentL) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01936" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1936"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loop">Loop</a> &#42;IL = L.getParentLoop(); IL != ParentL;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01937" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1937"><span class="doxyHighlight">         IL = IL-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loopbase/#ae34bcd53f75fab0c03b509ecccb4cfaf">getParentLoop</a>()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01938" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1938"><span class="doxyHighlight">      IL-&gt;getBlocksSet().erase(PH);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01939" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1939"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;BB : L.blocks())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01940" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1940"><span class="doxyHighlight">        IL-&gt;getBlocksSet().erase(BB);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01941" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1941"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac9a7de5a04920954ac964059cfc428ad">llvm::erase&#95;if</a>(IL-&gt;getBlocksVector(), &#91;&amp;&#93;(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;BB) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01943" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1943"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01944" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1944"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01945" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1945"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01946" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1946"><span class="doxyHighlight">    LI.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loopinfobase/#a97de9fb6fdce68e4e31300fcf0e5a20c">changeLoopFor</a>(PH, ParentL);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01949" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1949"><span class="doxyHighlight">      ParentL-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loopbase/#a990a86b0de7a84a9f489d2034878e330">addChildLoop</a>(&amp;L);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01952" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1952"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01953" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1953"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01954" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1954"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Now we update all the blocks which are no longer within the loop.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01955" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1955"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;Blocks = L.getBlocksVector();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01956" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1956"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> BlocksSplitI =</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01962" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1962"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01968" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1968"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Now erase these blocks from the loop.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01972" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1972"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01973" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1973"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Sort the exits in ascending loop depth, we&#39;ll work backwards across these</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01974" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1974"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// to process them inside out.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01975" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1975"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a076f93c387f454f0db13d4bc7d4e7f9c">llvm::stable&#95;sort</a>(ExitsInLoops, &#91;&amp;&#93;(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/x86/x86partialreduction-cpp/#a9e1483f7215664a2315c53c3558d9a8d">LHS</a>, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/x86/x86partialreduction-cpp/#a87b8bfbbe9d8f7146d7f20a5fb42efd0">RHS</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01977" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1977"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01978" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1978"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01979" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1979"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We&#39;ll build up a set for each exit loop.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01980" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1980"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallptrset">SmallPtrSet&lt;BasicBlock &#42;, 16&gt;</a> NewExitLoopBlocks;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01981" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1981"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loop">Loop</a> &#42;PrevExitL = L.getParentLoop(); </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The deepest possible exit loop.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01982" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1982"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02003" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2003"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// exit loop and this exit loop. This works because the ExitInLoops list is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02004" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2004"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// sorted in increasing order of loop depth and thus we visit loops in</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02076" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2076"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02077" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2077"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// To compute the new parent of this hoisted loop we look at where we</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02078" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2078"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// placed the preheader above. We can&#39;t lookup the header itself because we</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02079" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2079"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// retained the mapping from the header to the hoisted loop. But the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02080" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2080"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// preheader and header should have the exact same new parent computed</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02082" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2082"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// is a predecessor of the header and so reached in the reverse walk. And</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02083" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2083"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// because the loops were all in simplified form the preheader of the</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02206" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2206"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02207" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2207"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Constant and BBs tracking the cloned and continuing successor. When we are</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02208" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2208"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// unswitching the entire condition, this can just be trivially chosen to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02209" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2209"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// unswitch towards &#96;true&#96;. However, when we are unswitching a set of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02210" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2210"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// invariants combined with &#96;and&#96; or &#96;or&#96; or partially invariant instructions,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02211" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2211"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the combining operation determines the best direction to unswitch: we want</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02212" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2212"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// to unswitch the direction that will collapse the branch.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02429" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2429"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02430" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2430"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Note that we actually want to remove the parent block as a predecessor</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02431" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2431"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// of &#42;every&#42; case successor. The case successor is either unswitched,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02432" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2432"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// completely eliminating an edge from the parent to that successor, or it</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02433" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2433"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// is a duplicate edge to the retained successor as the retained successor</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02434" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2434"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// is always the default successor and as we&#39;ll replace this with a direct</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02435" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2435"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// branch we no longer need the duplicate entries in the PHI nodes.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02490" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2490"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Now that we have an accurate dominator tree, first delete the dead cloned</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02491" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2491"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// blocks so that we can accurately build any cloned loops. It is important to</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02504" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2504"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// First we delete the dead blocks from it and then we rebuild the loop</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02508" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2508"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (MSSAU &amp;&amp; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aa29fe161c408879ada30c90ebbf55dcf">VerifyMemorySSA</a>)</span></CodeLine>
