<Link id="l02514" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2514"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02515" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2515"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (MSSAU &amp;&amp; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aa29fe161c408879ada30c90ebbf55dcf">VerifyMemorySSA</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02516" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2516"><span class="doxyHighlight">    MSSAU-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/memoryssaupdater/#a01a350909e784d6fa43181a72de61529">getMemorySSA</a>()-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/memoryssa/#a88b10d37f671e58cf138ac84a8257c17">verifyMemorySSA</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02517" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2517"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02518" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2518"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This transformation has a high risk of corrupting the dominator tree, and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02519" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2519"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the below steps to rebuild loop structures will result in hard to debug</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02520" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2520"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// errors in that case so verify that the dominator tree is sane first.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02521" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2521"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// FIXME: Remove this when the bugs stop showing up and rely on existing</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02522" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2522"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// verification steps.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02523" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2523"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(DT.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dominatortreebase/#a1f08f2925fec05b265e540d29066b9c8">verify</a>(DominatorTree::VerificationLevel::Fast));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02524" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2524"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02525" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2525"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (BI &amp;&amp; !PartiallyInvariant) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02526" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2526"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If we unswitched a branch which collapses the condition to a known</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02527" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2527"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// constant we want to replace all the uses of the invariants within both</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02528" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2528"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the original and cloned blocks. We do this here so that we can use the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02529" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2529"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// now updated dominator tree to identify which side the users are on.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02530" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2530"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(UnswitchedSuccBBs.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/setvector/#a1a42c1ba878bd637f374197d05f0a97f">size</a>() == 1 &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02531" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2531"><span class="doxyHighlight">           </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Only one possible unswitched block for a branch!&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02532" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2532"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;ClonedPH = ClonedPHs.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/densemapbase/#a50d461a887e200e704e5157d3b21514d">begin</a>()-&gt;second;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02533" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2533"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02534" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2534"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// When considering multiple partially-unswitched invariants</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02535" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2535"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// we cant just go replace them with constants in both branches.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02536" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2536"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02537" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2537"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For &#39;AND&#39; we infer that true branch (&quot;continue&quot;) means true</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02538" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2538"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// for each invariant operand.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02539" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2539"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For &#39;OR&#39; we can infer that false branch (&quot;continue&quot;) means false</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02540" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2540"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// for each invariant operand.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02541" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2541"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// So it happens that for multiple-partial case we dont replace</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02542" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2542"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// in the unswitched branch.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02543" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2543"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ReplaceUnswitched =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02544" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2544"><span class="doxyHighlight">        FullUnswitch || (Invariants.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref/#a85ffb6531d4cda988ea81f18d4e56fb7">size</a>() == 1) || PartiallyInvariant;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02545" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2545"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02546" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2546"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/constantint">ConstantInt</a> &#42;UnswitchedReplacement =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02547" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2547"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/loopinfo-cpp/#ab4c7e3039b29b12e4dc97bcae93d79c3">Direction</a> ? <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/constantint/#a82dbbd8e3688b0bc1eedb338864d0d0c">ConstantInt::getTrue</a>(BI-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value/#ab3fc0225d8aaf8434026c3573f961f2c">getContext</a>())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02548" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2548"><span class="doxyHighlight">                  : <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/constantint/#aa7cce62ac5cc6df09cce0535874336b7">ConstantInt::getFalse</a>(BI-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value/#ab3fc0225d8aaf8434026c3573f961f2c">getContext</a>());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02549" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2549"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/constantint">ConstantInt</a> &#42;ContinueReplacement =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02550" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2550"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/loopinfo-cpp/#ab4c7e3039b29b12e4dc97bcae93d79c3">Direction</a> ? <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/constantint/#aa7cce62ac5cc6df09cce0535874336b7">ConstantInt::getFalse</a>(BI-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value/#ab3fc0225d8aaf8434026c3573f961f2c">getContext</a>())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02551" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2551"><span class="doxyHighlight">                  : <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/constantint/#a82dbbd8e3688b0bc1eedb338864d0d0c">ConstantInt::getTrue</a>(BI-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value/#ab3fc0225d8aaf8434026c3573f961f2c">getContext</a>());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02552" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2552"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;Invariant : Invariants) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02553" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2553"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(!<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a92ca992e52dddc420f4b069cae06dfbe">isa&lt;Constant&gt;</a>(Invariant) &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02554" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2554"><span class="doxyHighlight">             </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Should not be replacing constant values!&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02555" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2555"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Use make&#95;early&#95;inc&#95;range here as set invalidates the iterator.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02556" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2556"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/use">Use</a> &amp;U : <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a3d2cdc4a0db233678e7141c9d6ea3419">llvm::make&#95;early&#95;inc&#95;range</a>(Invariant-&gt;uses())) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02557" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2557"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42;UserI = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a22eeee01734061ac1b31ccd994c49eef">dyn&#95;cast&lt;Instruction&gt;</a>(U.getUser());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02558" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2558"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!UserI)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02559" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2559"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02560" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2560"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02561" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2561"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Replace it with the &#39;continue&#39; side if in the main loop body, and the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02562" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2562"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// unswitched if in the cloned blocks.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02563" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2563"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (DT.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dominatortree/#a5c69311e8d44898dac36a155c3d8691d">dominates</a>(LoopPH, UserI-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ilist-detail/node-parent-access/#a7e19e7508415378ad9523e0339b23e22">getParent</a>()))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02564" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2564"><span class="doxyHighlight">          U.set(ContinueReplacement);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02565" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2565"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (ReplaceUnswitched &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02566" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2566"><span class="doxyHighlight">                 DT.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dominatortree/#a5c69311e8d44898dac36a155c3d8691d">dominates</a>(ClonedPH, UserI-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ilist-detail/node-parent-access/#a7e19e7508415378ad9523e0339b23e22">getParent</a>()))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02567" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2567"><span class="doxyHighlight">          U.set(UnswitchedReplacement);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02568" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2568"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02569" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2569"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02570" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2570"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02571" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2571"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02572" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2572"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We can change which blocks are exit blocks of all the cloned sibling</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02573" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2573"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// loops, the current loop, and any parent loops which shared exit blocks</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02574" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2574"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// with the current loop. As a consequence, we need to re-form LCSSA for</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02575" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2575"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// them. But we shouldn&#39;t need to re-form LCSSA for any child loops.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02576" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2576"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// FIXME: This could be made more efficient by tracking which exit blocks are</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02577" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2577"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// new, and focusing on them, but that isn&#39;t likely to be necessary.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02578" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2578"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02579" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2579"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// In order to reasonably rebuild LCSSA we need to walk inside-out across the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02580" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2580"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// loop nest and update every loop that could have had its exits changed. We</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02581" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2581"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// also need to cover any intervening loops. We add all of these loops to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02582" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2582"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// a list and sort them by loop depth to achieve this without updating</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02583" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2583"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// unnecessary loops.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02584" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2584"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> UpdateLoop = &#91;&amp;&#93;(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loop">Loop</a> &amp;UpdateL) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02585" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2585"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#ifndef NDEBUG</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02586" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2586"><span class="doxyHighlight">    UpdateL.verifyLoop();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02587" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2587"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loop">Loop</a> &#42;ChildL : UpdateL) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02588" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2588"><span class="doxyHighlight">      ChildL-&gt;verifyLoop();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02589" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2589"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(ChildL-&gt;isRecursivelyLCSSAForm(DT, LI) &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02590" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2590"><span class="doxyHighlight">             </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Perturbed a child loop&#39;s LCSSA form!&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02591" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2591"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02592" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2592"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#endif</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02593" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2593"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// First build LCSSA for this loop so that we can preserve it when</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02594" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2594"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// forming dedicated exits. We don&#39;t want to perturb some other loop&#39;s</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02595" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2595"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// LCSSA while doing that CFG edit.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02596" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2596"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ae852af0cb2b1bee6f725a552cf7cfdea">formLCSSA</a>(UpdateL, DT, &amp;LI, SE);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02597" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2597"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02598" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2598"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For loops reached by this loop&#39;s original exit blocks we may</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02599" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2599"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// introduced new, non-dedicated exits. At least try to re-form dedicated</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02600" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2600"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// exits for these loops. This may fail if they couldn&#39;t have dedicated</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02601" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2601"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// exits to start with.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02602" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2602"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab1f7831449cd72e78894e3dcda705cd8">formDedicatedExitBlocks</a>(&amp;UpdateL, &amp;DT, &amp;LI, MSSAU, </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/&#42;PreserveLCSSA&#42;/</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02603" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2603"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02604" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2604"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02605" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2605"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For non-child cloned loops and hoisted loops, we just need to update LCSSA</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02606" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2606"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// and we can do it in any order as they don&#39;t nest relative to each other.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02607" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2607"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02608" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2608"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Also check if any of the loops we have updated have become top-level loops</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02609" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2609"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// as that will necessitate widening the outer loop scope.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02610" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2610"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loop">Loop</a> &#42;UpdatedL :</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02611" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2611"><span class="doxyHighlight">       <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a52ff73f5c87e0fb78fbdca0465300c95">llvm::concat&lt;Loop &#42;&gt;</a>(NonChildClonedLoops, HoistedLoops)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02612" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2612"><span class="doxyHighlight">    UpdateLoop(&#42;UpdatedL);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02613" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2613"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (UpdatedL-&gt;isOutermost())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02614" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2614"><span class="doxyHighlight">      OuterExitL = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02615" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2615"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02616" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2616"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (IsStillLoop) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02617" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2617"><span class="doxyHighlight">    UpdateLoop(L);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02618" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2618"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (L.isOutermost())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02619" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2619"><span class="doxyHighlight">      OuterExitL = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02620" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2620"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02621" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2621"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02622" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2622"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If the original loop had exit blocks, walk up through the outer most loop</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02623" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2623"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// of those exit blocks to update LCSSA and form updated dedicated exits.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02624" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2624"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (OuterExitL != &amp;L)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02625" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2625"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loop">Loop</a> &#42;OuterL = ParentL; OuterL != OuterExitL;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02626" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2626"><span class="doxyHighlight">         OuterL = OuterL-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loopbase/#ae34bcd53f75fab0c03b509ecccb4cfaf">getParentLoop</a>())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02627" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2627"><span class="doxyHighlight">      UpdateLoop(&#42;OuterL);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02628" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2628"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02629" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2629"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#ifndef NDEBUG</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02630" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2630"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Verify the entire loop structure to catch any incorrect updates before we</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02631" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2631"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// progress in the pass pipeline.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02632" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2632"><span class="doxyHighlight">  LI.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loopinfobase/#a17a8f7aba5cca5c7f9faa779a3c4bc37">verify</a>(DT);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02633" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2633"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#endif</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02634" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2634"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02635" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2635"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Now that we&#39;ve unswitched something, make callbacks to report the changes.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02636" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2636"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For that we need to merge together the updated loops and the cloned loops</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02637" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2637"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// and check whether the original loop survived.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02638" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2638"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">SmallVector&lt;Loop &#42;, 4&gt;</a> SibLoops;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02639" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2639"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loop">Loop</a> &#42;UpdatedL : <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a52ff73f5c87e0fb78fbdca0465300c95">llvm::concat&lt;Loop &#42;&gt;</a>(NonChildClonedLoops, HoistedLoops))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02640" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2640"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (UpdatedL-&gt;getParentLoop() == ParentL)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02641" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2641"><span class="doxyHighlight">      SibLoops.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatebase/#af42bfbc067df27c19ee2fc859df58799">push&#95;back</a>(UpdatedL);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02642" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2642"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="#a45007554e260296266b8ae927dde223f">postUnswitch</a>(L, LoopUpdater, LoopName, IsStillLoop, PartiallyInvariant,</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02644" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2644"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02645" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2645"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (MSSAU &amp;&amp; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aa29fe161c408879ada30c90ebbf55dcf">VerifyMemorySSA</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02646" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2646"><span class="doxyHighlight">    MSSAU-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/memoryssaupdater/#a01a350909e784d6fa43181a72de61529">getMemorySSA</a>()-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/memoryssa/#a88b10d37f671e58cf138ac84a8257c17">verifyMemorySSA</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02647" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2647"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02648" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2648"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (BI)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02649" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2649"><span class="doxyHighlight">    ++NumBranches;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02650" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2650"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02651" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2651"><span class="doxyHighlight">    ++NumSwitches;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02652" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2652"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02653" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2653"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02654" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2654"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Recursively compute the cost of a dominator subtree based on the per-block</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02655" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2655"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// cost map provided.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02656" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2656"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02657" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2657"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// The recursive computation is memozied into the provided DT-indexed cost map</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02658" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2658"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// to allow querying it for most nodes in the domtree without it becoming</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02659" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2659"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// quadratic.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02660" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2660" lineLink="#a78a15f5bff768264b9e435e319db18f3"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instructioncost">InstructionCost</a> <a href="#a78a15f5bff768264b9e435e319db18f3">computeDomSubtreeCost</a>(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02661" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2661"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a58b9df85470fc4e2a8066ff6a62e5a34">DomTreeNode</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a>,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02662" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2662"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smalldensemap">SmallDenseMap&lt;BasicBlock &#42;, InstructionCost, 4&gt;</a> &amp;BBCostMap,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02663" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2663"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smalldensemap">SmallDenseMap&lt;DomTreeNode &#42;, InstructionCost, 4&gt;</a> &amp;DTCostMap) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02664" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2664"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Don&#39;t accumulate cost (or recurse through) blocks not in our block cost</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02665" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2665"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// map and thus not part of the duplication cost being considered.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02666" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2666"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> BBCostIt = BBCostMap.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/densemapbase/#a0c047f127ed4380a6f383d70bec4eb94">find</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a>.getBlock());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02667" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2667"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (BBCostIt == BBCostMap.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/densemapbase/#a65520b9c67759099e313d0f4e7b5ff9e">end</a>())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02668" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2668"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02669" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2669"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02670" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2670"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Lookup this node to see if we already computed its cost.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02671" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2671"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> DTCostIt = DTCostMap.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/densemapbase/#a0c047f127ed4380a6f383d70bec4eb94">find</a>(&amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02672" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2672"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (DTCostIt != DTCostMap.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/densemapbase/#a65520b9c67759099e313d0f4e7b5ff9e">end</a>())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02673" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2673"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> DTCostIt-&gt;second;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02674" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2674"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02675" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2675"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If not, we have to compute it. We can&#39;t use insert above and update</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02676" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2676"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// because computing the cost may insert more things into the map.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02677" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2677"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instructioncost">InstructionCost</a> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a19921a3ceb99548f498d3df118eda9ed">Cost</a> = std::accumulate(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02678" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2678"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a>.begin(), <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a>.end(), BBCostIt-&gt;second,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02679" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2679"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#91;&amp;&#93;(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instructioncost">InstructionCost</a> Sum, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a58b9df85470fc4e2a8066ff6a62e5a34">DomTreeNode</a> &#42;ChildN) -&gt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instructioncost">InstructionCost</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02680" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2680"><span class="doxyHighlight">        return Sum + computeDomSubtreeCost(&#42;ChildN, BBCostMap, DTCostMap);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02681" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2681"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02682" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2682"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Inserted = DTCostMap.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/densemapbase/#adb33f3ede2f5bfc9b3ee658aaf648492">insert</a>(&#123;&amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a>, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a19921a3ceb99548f498d3df118eda9ed">Cost</a>&#125;).second;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02683" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2683"><span class="doxyHighlight">  (void)Inserted;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02685" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2685"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a19921a3ceb99548f498d3df118eda9ed">Cost</a>;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02687" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2687"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02688" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2688"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Turns a select instruction into implicit control flow branch,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02689" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2689"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// making the following replacement:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02690" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2690"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02691" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2691"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// head:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02692" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2692"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   --code before select--</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02693" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2693"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   select %cond, %trueval, %falseval</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02694" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2694"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   --code after select--</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02695" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2695"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02696" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2696"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// into</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02697" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2697"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02698" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2698"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// head:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02699" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2699"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   --code before select--</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02700" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2700"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   br i1 %cond, label %then, label %tail</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02701" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2701"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02702" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2702"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// then:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02703" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2703"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   br %tail</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02704" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2704"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02705" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2705"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// tail:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02706" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2706"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   phi &#91; %trueval, %then &#93;, &#91; %falseval, %head&#93;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02707" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2707"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   unreachable</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02708" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2708"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02709" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2709"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// It also makes all relevant DT and LI updates, so that all structures are in</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02710" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2710"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// valid state after this transform.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02712" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2712"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                        <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loopinfo">LoopInfo</a> &amp;LI, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/memoryssaupdater">MemorySSAUpdater</a> &#42;MSSAU,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02713" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2713"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                        <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/assumptioncache">AssumptionCache</a> &#42;AC) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02714" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2714"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Turning &quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;&lt; &#42;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/si">SI</a> &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot; into a branch.\\n&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02741" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2741"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Turns a llvm.experimental.guard intrinsic into implicit control flow branch,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02742" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2742"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// making the following replacement:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02743" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2743"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02744" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2744"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   --code before guard--</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02745" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2745"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   call void (i1, ...) @llvm.experimental.guard(i1 %cond) &#91; &quot;deopt&quot;() &#93;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02746" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2746"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   --code after guard--</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02747" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2747"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02748" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2748"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// into</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02749" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2749"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02751" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2751"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   br i1 %cond, label %guarded, label %deopt</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02752" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2752"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02753" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2753"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// guarded:</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02803" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2803"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02804" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2804"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02805" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2805"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Cost multiplier is a way to limit potentially exponential behavior</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02806" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2806"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// of loop-unswitch. Cost is multipied in proportion of 2^number of unswitch</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02807" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2807"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// candidates available. Also accounting for the number of &quot;sibling&quot; loops with</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02808" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2808"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// the idea to account for previous unswitches that already happened on this</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02809" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2809"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// cluster of loops. There was an attempt to keep this formula simple,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02810" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2810"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// just enough to limit the worst case behavior. Even if it is not that simple</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02811" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2811"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// now it is still not an attempt to provide a detailed heuristic size</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02812" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2812"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// prediction.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02813" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2813"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02814" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2814"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// TODO: Make a proper accounting of &quot;explosion&quot; effect for all kinds of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02815" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2815"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// unswitch candidates, making adequate predictions instead of wild guesses.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02816" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2816"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// That requires knowing not just the number of &quot;remaining&quot; candidates but</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02817" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2817"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// also costs of unswitching for each of these candidates.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02818" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2818" lineLink="#a0e686f0d790f0fd925a036c4cb50199b"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="#a0e686f0d790f0fd925a036c4cb50199b">CalculateUnswitchCostMultiplier</a>(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02819" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2819"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &amp;TI, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loop">Loop</a> &amp;L, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loopinfo">LoopInfo</a> &amp;LI,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02820" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2820"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dominatortree">DominatorTree</a> &amp;DT,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02821" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2821"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef&lt;NonTrivialUnswitchCandidate&gt;</a> UnswitchCandidates) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02822" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2822"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02823" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2823"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Guards and other exiting conditions do not contribute to exponential</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02824" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2824"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// explosion as soon as they dominate the latch (otherwise there might be</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02825" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2825"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// another path to the latch remaining that does not allow to eliminate the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02826" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2826"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// loop copy on unswitch).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02827" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2827"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;Latch = L.getLoopLatch();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02828" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2828"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;CondBlock = TI.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ilist-detail/node-parent-access/#a7e19e7508415378ad9523e0339b23e22">getParent</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02829" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2829"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (DT.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dominatortree/#a5c69311e8d44898dac36a155c3d8691d">dominates</a>(CondBlock, Latch) &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02830" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2830"><span class="doxyHighlight">      (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a656efdcee3deb029763304d3e741a2d1">isGuard</a>(&amp;TI) ||</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02831" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2831"><span class="doxyHighlight">       (TI.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction/#a7653277511df1034148a37520a585bb5">isTerminator</a>() &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02832" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2832"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac214df91cdc242f4710ea5a93939c678">llvm::count&#95;if</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a26e2a938b431eaa6eca2beaa96410c9d">successors</a>(&amp;TI), &#91;&amp;L&#93;(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;SuccBB) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02833" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2833"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> L.contains(SuccBB);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02834" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2834"><span class="doxyHighlight">        &#125;) &lt;= 1))) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02835" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2835"><span class="doxyHighlight">    NumCostMultiplierSkipped++;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02836" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2836"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> 1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02837" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2837"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02838" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2838"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02839" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2839"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;ParentL = L.getParentLoop();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02840" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2840"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> SiblingsCount = (ParentL ? ParentL-&gt;getSubLoopsVector().<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/nvptx/nvvmreflect-cpp/#ac934769d93af95250952646a3829df4c">size</a>()</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02841" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2841"><span class="doxyHighlight">                               : std::distance(LI.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loopinfobase/#ab447b41b9c51151b5c6ef497a60689ae">begin</a>(), LI.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loopinfobase/#a4f728602e7d377829675f13446cf6647">end</a>()));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02842" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2842"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Count amount of clones that all the candidates might cause during</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02843" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2843"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// unswitching. Branch/guard/select counts as 1, switch counts as log2 of its</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02844" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2844"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// cases.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02845" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2845"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> UnswitchedClones = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02846" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2846"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;Candidate : UnswitchCandidates) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02847" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2847"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42;CI = Candidate.TI;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02848" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2848"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;CondBlock = CI-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ilist-detail/node-parent-access/#a7e19e7508415378ad9523e0339b23e22">getParent</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02849" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2849"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> SkipExitingSuccessors = DT.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dominatortree/#a5c69311e8d44898dac36a155c3d8691d">dominates</a>(CondBlock, Latch);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02850" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2850"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a92ca992e52dddc420f4b069cae06dfbe">isa&lt;SelectInst&gt;</a>(CI)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02851" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2851"><span class="doxyHighlight">      UnswitchedClones++;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02852" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2852"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02853" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2853"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02854" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2854"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a656efdcee3deb029763304d3e741a2d1">isGuard</a>(CI)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02855" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2855"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!SkipExitingSuccessors)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02856" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2856"><span class="doxyHighlight">        UnswitchedClones++;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02857" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2857"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02858" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2858"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02859" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2859"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NonExitingSuccessors =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02860" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2860"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac214df91cdc242f4710ea5a93939c678">llvm::count&#95;if</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a26e2a938b431eaa6eca2beaa96410c9d">successors</a>(CondBlock),</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02861" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2861"><span class="doxyHighlight">                       &#91;SkipExitingSuccessors, &amp;L&#93;(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;SuccBB) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02862" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2862"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> !SkipExitingSuccessors || L.contains(SuccBB);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02863" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2863"><span class="doxyHighlight">        &#125;);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02864" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2864"><span class="doxyHighlight">    UnswitchedClones += <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a646986783f35e0fef8988f0f28d2589f">Log2&#95;32</a>(NonExitingSuccessors);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02865" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2865"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02866" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2866"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02867" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2867"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Ignore up to the &quot;unscaled candidates&quot; number of unswitch candidates</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02868" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2868"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// when calculating the power-of-two scaling of the cost. The main idea</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02869" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2869"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// with this control is to allow a small number of unswitches to happen</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02870" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2870"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// and rely more on siblings multiplier (see below) when the number</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02871" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2871"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// of candidates is small.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02872" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2872"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ClonesPower =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02873" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2873"><span class="doxyHighlight">      std::max(UnswitchedClones - (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight">)<a href="#a49834115bcfb38ad510305e2e587f67a">UnswitchNumInitialUnscaledCandidates</a>, 0);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02874" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2874"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02875" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2875"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Allowing top-level loops to spread a bit more than nested ones.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02876" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2876"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> SiblingsMultiplier =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02877" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2877"><span class="doxyHighlight">      std::max((ParentL ? SiblingsCount</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02878" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2878"><span class="doxyHighlight">                        : SiblingsCount / (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight">)<a href="#a8ec915a44f00522e05af0372fe598372">UnswitchSiblingsToplevelDiv</a>),</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02879" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2879"><span class="doxyHighlight">               1);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02880" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2880"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Compute the cost multiplier in a way that won&#39;t overflow by saturating</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02881" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2881"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// at an upper bound.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02882" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2882"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> CostMultiplier;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02883" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2883"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (ClonesPower &gt; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a646986783f35e0fef8988f0f28d2589f">Log2&#95;32</a>(<a href="#a639210c26d1952e9108bcdbb0353443b">UnswitchThreshold</a>) ||</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02884" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2884"><span class="doxyHighlight">      SiblingsMultiplier &gt; <a href="#a639210c26d1952e9108bcdbb0353443b">UnswitchThreshold</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02885" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2885"><span class="doxyHighlight">    CostMultiplier = <a href="#a639210c26d1952e9108bcdbb0353443b">UnswitchThreshold</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02886" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2886"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02887" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2887"><span class="doxyHighlight">    CostMultiplier = std::min(SiblingsMultiplier &#42; (1 &lt;&lt; ClonesPower),</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02888" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2888"><span class="doxyHighlight">                              (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight">)<a href="#a639210c26d1952e9108bcdbb0353443b">UnswitchThreshold</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02889" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2889"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02890" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2890"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;  Computed multiplier  &quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;&lt; CostMultiplier</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l03063" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3063"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03064" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3064"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Materialize pending invariant condition of the given candidate into IR. The</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03065" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3065"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// injected loop-invariant condition implies the original loop-variant branch</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03066" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3066"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// condition, so the materialization turns</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03067" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3067"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03068" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3068"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// loop&#95;block:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03069" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3069"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   ...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03070" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3070"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   br i1 %variant&#95;cond, label InLoopSucc, label OutOfLoopSucc</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03071" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3071"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03072" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3072"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// into</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03073" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3073"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03074" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3074"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// preheader:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03075" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3075"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   %invariant&#95;cond = LHS pred RHS</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03076" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3076"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// ...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03077" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3077"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// loop&#95;block:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03078" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3078"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   br i1 %invariant&#95;cond, label InLoopSucc, label OriginalCheck</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l03160" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3160"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// TODO: In fact, cost of unswitching a new invariant candidate is &#42;slightly&#42;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03161" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3161"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// higher because we have just inserted a new block. Need to think how to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3162"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// adjust the cost of injected candidates when it was first computed.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03163" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3163"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Injected a new loop-invariant branch &quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;&lt; &#42;InvariantBr</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03164" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3164"><span class="doxyHighlight">                    &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot; and considering it for unswitching.&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03165" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3165"><span class="doxyHighlight">  ++NumInvariantConditionsInjected;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03166" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3166"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-simpleloopunswitch-cpp-/nontrivialunswitchcandidate/#a428fcbe432c0149594a5fe987bafd318">NonTrivialUnswitchCandidate</a>(InvariantBr, &#123; InjectedCond &#125;,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03167" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3167"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                     Candidate.Cost);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03168" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3168"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03169" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3169"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3170"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Given chain of loop branch conditions looking like:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3171"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   br (Variant &lt; Invariant1)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03172" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3172"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   br (Variant &lt; Invariant2)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03173" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3173"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   br (Variant &lt; Invariant3)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03174" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3174"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   ...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03175" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3175"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// collect set of invariant conditions on which we want to unswitch, which</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03176" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3176"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// look like:</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l03180" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3180"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Though they might not immediately exist in the IR, we can still inject them.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l03203" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3203"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03204" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3204"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Collect unswitch candidates by invariant conditions that are not immediately</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03205" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3205"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// present in the loop. However, they can be injected into the code if we</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03206" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3206"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// decide it&#39;s profitable.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03207" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3207"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// An example of such conditions is following:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03208" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3208"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03209" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3209"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   for (...) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03210" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3210"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///     x = load ...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03211" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3211"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///     if (! x &lt;u C1) break;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03212" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3212"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///     if (! x &lt;u C2) break;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03213" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3213"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///     &lt;do something&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03214" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3214"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03215" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3215"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03216" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3216"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// We can unswitch by condition &quot;C1 &lt;=u C2&quot;. If that is true, then &quot;x &lt;u C1 &lt;=</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03217" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3217"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// C2&quot; automatically implies &quot;x &lt;u C2&quot;, so we can get rid of one of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03218" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3218"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// loop-variant checks in unswitched loop version.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03219" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3219" lineLink="#a607c1e689b230ff38733bfc0bfd3b6da"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="#a607c1e689b230ff38733bfc0bfd3b6da">collectUnswitchCandidatesWithInjections</a>(</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l03330" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3330"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Compute the cost of each block, as well as the total loop cost. Also, bail</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l03332" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3332"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// (convergent, noduplicate, or cross-basic-block tokens).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03333" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3333"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// FIXME: We might be able to safely handle some of these in non-duplicated</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03334" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3334"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// regions.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03335" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3335"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targettransforminfo/#a706f223f760b55668fbae74202b816bb">TargetTransformInfo::TargetCostKind</a> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/costmodel-cpp/#a162d8b2b3865594d1e14d828d2b8336a">CostKind</a> =</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l03339" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3339"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instructioncost">InstructionCost</a> LoopCost = 0;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l03342" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3342"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> : &#42;BB) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
